info.author: Martin Vielsmaier
info.description:
# pytest libnotify

Notifications for pytest that update while the tests are running & show failing
tests before the test session finished.


## Installation

```bash
pip install pytest-libnotify
```

info.name: pytest-libnotify
info.summary: Pytest plugin that shows notifications about the test run

# pytest libnotify

Notifications for pytest that update while the tests are running & show failing tests before the test session finished.

## Installation

`bash pip install pytest-libnotify `
